quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does — keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Done is better than perfect.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.text: A satisfied client is the best business strategy of all.
quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

quotes.text: Your reputation is more important than your paycheck.
quotes.author: Congresswoman Maxine Waters

quotes.text: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Chase the vision, not the money. The money will end up following you.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.text: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Freelancing is not just a job. It's a lifestyle built on discipline.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are your own boss — act like it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Small steps every day lead to big results over time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Deliver more than expected and clients will never leave.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your skills are your currency. Keep investing in them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Deadlines are not the enemy — procrastination is.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: One great client is worth ten mediocre ones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Rest is not quitting. It's part of the process.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your portfolio speaks louder than your pitch.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every invoice paid is proof that your craft has value.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Consistency beats talent when talent doesn't show up.
quotes.author: Unknown
